article_title: Massachusetts ObamaCare Website Transition To Cost Taxpayers Over $1B

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: The transition to the ACA in Massachusetts has been a bumpy one, to say the least. Yet the taxpayer tab is growing as the 2-year cost of transitioning to an ACA state-based website will exceed $1 billion, when you include both administrative and "transitional" Medicaid costs.
